title: If there is no data for series, it should pop up a friendly error message to remind.
OB: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, no error message is displayed.
EB: If there is no data for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column that does not have any data. 3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
